name: netsil-collectors
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS Service is currently in preview.

You may want to change the 'instances' field to control how many collectors you wish to install.

For instance, you may want one collector for every server you wish to monitor.

In addition, you may need to change the 'role' field to control on which nodes to install the collectors.

You can find more documentation and usage information at https://github.com/dcos/examples/blob/master/netsil/README.md
